This repository contains the files necessary to reproduce my paper "Collective Speech Among Addiction Treatment Organizations". Feel free to contact me at [gv42@duke.edu](gv42@duke.edu)

Steps: (1) Run "code.rmd" (2) run "full_paper.rmd"

Paul C. Bauer's paper [https://osf.io/q395s](https://osf.io/q395s) was incredibly helpful in learning how to produce and share reproducible work
